text: Krispy Krunchy Chicken, also known as KKC, is an American chain of fried chicken fast food restaurants founded in 1989 in Lafayette, Louisiana by Neal Onebane. It has over 2,500 locations in 46 states, often in association with convenience stores and gas stations. ==See also== * List of fast-food chicken restaurants * List of fast food restaurant chains == References == Category:Chicken chains of the United States Category:Fast-food chains of the United States
title: Krispy Krunchy Chicken
